title: Align Landing Page UI with MAGICAL SERVICE HTML Layout

requirements.summary: Update LandingPage to match the provided MAGICAL SERVICE HTML structure, Tailwind styling, copy, and link targets (navbar, hero, rates, benefits, UPI/review, WhatsApp FAB).
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders the navbar, hero, service rates grid, benefits strip, UPI/review section, and WhatsApp floating button in the same order as the provided HTML snippet.
All user-facing text matches the provided snippet exactly (including capitalization for headings like "MAGICAL SERVICE" and "Scan to Pay (UPI)").
Links match the snippet exactly: phone uses `tel:+918000262644`, WhatsApp uses `https://wa.me/918000262644`, review uses `https://share.google/CAZwztDsnRKHBaOAM`.
Service cards have hover lift behavior consistent with the snippet (`hover:-translate-y-2` and transition).
UPI QR image uses the exact external `api.qrserver.com` URL from the snippet and displays the UPI ID text as "UPI ID: jrg7311@okicici".

file_operations.description: Restructure the landing page JSX to follow the provided HTML snippet order and layout: (1) sticky top navbar with text-only brand "MAGICAL SERVICE" and "Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar" plus phone CTA linking to `tel:+918000262644`; (2) add the blue hero section with heading "Professional Cleaning Service", subheading "Trusted Experts in Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar", and primary "WhatsApp Inquiry" button linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`; (3) render the "Our Service Rates" section with underlined title and four service-rate cards (Sofa/AC Jet/Mattress/Carpet-Chair) using the snippet’s rounded corners, borders, and hover translate/transition behavior; (4) render the 3-item benefits strip including the snippet’s mobile border-top behavior; (5) render the UPI + review section with heading "Scan to Pay (UPI)", QR image using the exact provided URL, and the text "UPI ID: jrg7311@okicici", plus the Google review link button to `https://share.google/CAZwztDsnRKHBaOAM`; keep the floating WhatsApp button fixed bottom-right linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`.

requirements.summary: Replace any FontAwesome `<i class="...">` icon usage implied by the HTML with existing project icon libraries while preserving visual intent.
acceptanceCriteria: No FontAwesome dependency is introduced for this change.
All icons render without runtime errors and are visually representative of the intended meaning (phone, WhatsApp, service icons, benefit icons).

file_operations.description: Ensure all icons used for phone/WhatsApp, service-rate cards, and benefits are implemented via the existing icon approach already present in the project (e.g., `lucide-react` and `react-icons`) and that no FontAwesome `<i class="...">` usage or new FontAwesome dependency is added.
